name: pulumi-nanovms
description: A provider for NanoVMs with pulumi-go-provider.

pulumi-nanovms:index:Image.description: A NanoVMs image resource for building unikernel images

config.description: The configuration of the built image as a JSON encoded string

imageName.description: The name of the built image

imagePath.description: The path to the built image

provider.description: The cloud provider of the built image

useLatestKernel.description: If the latest kernel should be used, download it if necessary

config.description: The configuration as a JSON encoded string

elf.description: The path to the executable file

force.description: If an already existing image should be deleted if it exists

provider.description: The target cloud provider (e.g., onprem, gcp, aws, azure, oracle, openstack, vsphere, upcloud, do, linode, vultr)

useLatestKernel.description: If the latest kernel should be used, download it if necessary

pulumi-nanovms:index:Instance.description: A NanoVMs resource for deploying unikernel images

image.description: The name of the image deployed

instanceID.description: The unique identifier for the instance

private_ips.description: The private IP addresses of the instance

public_ips.description: The public IP addresses of the instance

image.description: The name of the image to deploy

pulumi-nanovms:index:PackageImage.description: A NanoVMs package image resource for building unikernel images from packages

architecture.description: The target architecture of the built image

config.description: The configuration of the built image as a JSON encoded string

imageName.description: The name of the built image

imagePath.description: The path to the built image

packageName.description: The name of the package used

provider.description: The cloud provider of the built image

useLatestKernel.description: If the latest kernel should be used, download it if necessary

architecture.description: The target architecture (amd64 or arm64). If not specified, uses the current system architecture

config.description: The configuration as a JSON encoded string

force.description: If an already existing image should be deleted if it exists

packageName.description: The name of the package to use (e.g., 'node_v18.7.0')

provider.description: The target cloud provider (e.g., onprem, gcp, aws, azure, oracle, openstack, vsphere, upcloud, do, linode, vultr)

useLatestKernel.description: If the latest kernel should be used, download it if necessary
